original_text: title_comparation: AComparative Analysis of the Oil Regulatory Family TK4: TK4 vs TK4MB product_main: __TECH16_ Series introduction: The __TECH16_ series represents the evolution of oil level regulators, introducing smart functionality for configuration and diagnostics. Although both models, TK4 and TK4MB, share the same robust mechanical platform and pressure variants (46, 80, 130 __TECH39_), their fundamental difference lies in communication capabilities. This choice defines their scope, from advanced stand-alone units to fully integrated components in centralised supervision systems (BMS/SCADA).

Installation/configuration notes (if relevant) 5. Follow-up considerations or alternatives PRODUCT CATEGORIES YOU SUPPORT: - Oil Level Controllers (TK1+, __TECH13_, __TECH16_ series - standard and MODBUS) - Liquid Level Sensors (_TECH20_, __TECH25_, __TECH9_, __TECH2_ series) - ATEX-certified sensors (explosive environments) - Infrared electro-optic sensors (plastic and metallic) - A_dapters and accessories (Rotalock, various flanges types) CORE TECHNOLOGY: - Electro-optic infrared (IR) detection - Fast response time (instantaneous) - High21___, various flanges types -Techology: - Electro-optic infrared (IR) detection - Fast response time (instantaneous) - High21_oCurationalCuration CRITICAL REMINDER: Response ONLY in the user's question language. Complete technical text: title_comparation: AComparative Analysis of the Oil Regulatory Family TK4: TK4 vs TK4MB product_main: __TECH16_ Series introduction: The __TECH16_ series represents the evolution of oil level regulators, introducing smart functionality for configuration and diagnostics. Although both models, TK4 and TK4MB, share the same robust mechanical platform and pressure variants (46, 80, 130 __TECH39_), their fundamental difference lies in communication capabilities. This choice defines their scope, from advanced stand-alone units to fully integrated components in centralised supervision systems (BMS/SCADA). --- Question: What is the maximum pressure range for TK4 Series? Response as an expert Teklab technical sales assistant: - Provide accurate technical specifications - Explain product features and applications clearly - Give installation and configuration guidance - Focus on PRACTICAL IMPLEMENTATION and compatibility - Cite pressure ranges, temperatures, certificates when relevant
The TK4 Series is a smart oil level regulator that offers advanced configuration and diagnostics, making it suitable for various applications.

metadata.chunk_title: TK4 Series Smart Oil Level Regulator
key_concepts: Smart oil level regulation with advanced configuration and diagnostics
Different communication protocols for various applications
Robust mechanical platform and pressure variants
Integration with supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) systems
ATEX certification for safe operation in hazardous environments
iconic_quotes: La serie TK4 rappresenta l'evoluzione dei regolatori di livello olio, introducendo funzionalità smart per la configurazione e la diagnostica.
Questo scelta definisce il loro ambito di applicazione, da unità stand-alone avanzate a componenti pienamente integrati in sistemi di supervisione centralizzati (BMS/SCADA).

qa_pairs.question: What is the maximum pressure range supported by the TK4 Series?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 Series supports pressure variants of 46bar, 80bar, and 130bar. The choice of pressure variant depends on the specific application and requirements.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4 Series communicate with SCADA systems?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 Series uses MODBUS RTU communication protocol for integration with supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) systems. This allows for remote monitoring and control of the oil level regulator.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure range for TK4 Series?
How does TK4 Series communicate with SCADA?
metadata.summary: The TK4 Series is a smart oil level regulator that offers advanced configuration and diagnostics, making it suitable for various applications.
